Tips.Tip: Create a shortcut to access your settings.json file in VSCode. This will allow you to easily make changes to the file, without having to find it using a lengthy process. Scroll down(codeBlockRef) to see instructions on making a shortcut.

ComponentData.Name: Create a Shortcut to Access VSCode Setting.json
ComponentData.Description: Open Visual Studio Code, then press "command + shift + p". Then, in the dialogue box type "Open Keyboard Shortcuts (JSON)". Click on the matching result. Copy and paste the json below into the file then save it. Now the shortcut "Command + option + =" should open settings.json
